Bertrand Tavernier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bertrand_Tavernier 0 Bertrand Tavernier (born 25 April 1941) is a French director, screenwriter, actor and producer. Bertrand_Tavernier ( born 25_April_1941 ) is a_French_director , screenwriter , actor_and_producer .
